alert.note: Alert for Howard; Little River; Sevier (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 7:26AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Little River, Sevier, northwestern Howard and southeastern McCurtain Counties through 815 AM CST... At 725 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Vandervoort to 9 miles south of Idabel. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Queen, Horatio, Umpire, Lockesburg, Gillham, Athens, Haworth, Bokhoma, Eagletown, Moon, Cerrogordo, Harris, Geneva, Goodwater, Shinewell, Lebanon, America, Burg, West Line and West Otis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
